    private java.lang.String CharacterGame.reportCombat​(Character combatant, Attack attack, AttackReport report)
    This method generates a report on how a character performed, with the combatant details, what attack they generated, how they defended.
    private java.lang.String CharacterGame.reportEndingState​(Character combatant1, Character combatant2)
    This method simply generates a report based on the statistics of the two characters passed, calling toString() on each.
    private java.lang.String CharacterGame.reportEndOfMatch​(Character combatant1, Character combatant2)
    This method generates a report suitable for display after a fight has concluded, it includes the fight outcome (winner, looser, draw), as well as each Character's state.

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BlueDragon
    BlueDragon is a subclass of Characer, it inherites all the fields from the parent, also overides the attack() and defend() methods according to the rules of the game.
